author: Jean-pierre Declemy
content: Don’t anyone tell them that as the icecap over Greenland melts the land will start to rise upwards after being depressed for millennia with the weight of the frozen water. author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Washington Post has a nice back-of-the-envelope numerical analysis of how much sediment would be needed to reproduce the SLR signal we now see. About 5″ per year skimmed off of the entire continental United States.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/politics/wp/2018/05/17/heres-how-big-a-rock-youd-have-to-drop-into-the-ocean-to-see-the-rise-in-sea-level-happening-now/?utm_term=.31f60c028a16

There’s also an article in today’s Post patiently re-explaining to conspiracy theorists that yes, Hitler really is dead. Same audience as the rock-droppers, really.
